snippet.title: Driver charged after police chase
snippet.content: A DRIVER has been charged after a police chase in Salisbury early Saturday morning. The 34-year-old man was arrested after police tried to stop him for a breath test just after 1am but he refused to stop. Police chased the driver for a short time before he collided with a roundabout on Fenden Road. The Salisbury East man was charged with engaging in a police pursuit and driving without due car. He was bailed to appear in the Elizabeth Magistrates Court on September 13.
